page.title: 10OAKENGATES RAILWAY STATION
page.content:
Oakengates railway station was built about 150 years ago.The station master is Mr.Robert.He has been working for British Rail for 45 years.
About 300 people use the station in a day. There are 28 trains which stop at the station. 12-14 passenger trains go straight through. Between 20 and 30 freight trains also pass through.
One of most the popular places people want to go to is Shrewsbury. The station is open from 6.20am until 2.20pm. When the station has closed you have to pay on the train.
Mr. Robert said that the new station which is being built at Telford Town Centre will reduce the number of people using Oakengates station.
